div.p: Please click the link below regarding Employee Rights

div.h3: Important Message From Superintendent - Schools Closed Through April 29, 2020

p.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: This letter is to inform you about two important decisions that were made today by different government agencies:

p.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: 1. Governor Cuomo officially closed all New York schools through April 29. He continues to make decisions in two week intervals.

p.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: 2. NYSED announced that the Regents Exams scheduled for this June are cancelled. I will share additional information on this decision when it is available.

p.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;
font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 15px; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; font-weight: 400;

div.p: For translations of this communication, clickhere.

div.h3: May 19, 2020 Annual District Election Has Been Postponed
div.div:
Under Executive Order, all library and school board elections have been postponed until at least June 1, 2020. This also postpones the circulation, filing and collection of candidate petitions.
We will update the website when we receive further information.
